tool_description: Is this comment positive or negative? Find out the tone.
name: Sentiment Analysis
title: Sentiment Analysis

api_list.name: Analyze (post)
api_list.description: Return sentiment analysis results with score for the given text.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Enter some text to analyze (maximum 100 words or 1,500 characters)
parameters.default: great value in its price range!

utterances.utterance: Can you tell me if the phrase 'The movie was absolutely fantastic and thrilling' has a positive or negative sentiment?

parameters.text: The movie was absolutely fantastic and thrilling

utterances.utterance: Analyze the sentiment of this review: 'I found the customer service to be very disappointing and unhelpful.'

parameters.text: I found the customer service to be very disappointing and unhelpful.

utterances.utterance: What is the sentiment score for the statement 'The new phone model is sleek and performs exceptionally well'?

parameters.text: The new phone model is sleek and performs exceptionally well

utterances.utterance: Please check if the comment 'The food was bland and the waiter was rude' is positive or negative.

parameters.text: The food was bland and the waiter was rude

utterances.utterance: Could you analyze the sentiment of this text: 'I am thrilled with the quick delivery and excellent packaging'?

parameters.text: I am thrilled with the quick delivery and excellent packaging

utterances.utterance: Is the sentence 'The software update caused many bugs and crashes' expressing a positive or negative feeling?

parameters.text: The software update caused many bugs and crashes

utterances.utterance: Evaluate the sentiment of the phrase 'The concert was a wonderful experience with amazing performances.'

parameters.text: The concert was a wonderful experience with amazing performances.

utterances.utterance: What sentiment does the text 'I regret buying this product because it stopped working after a week' convey?

parameters.text: I regret buying this product because it stopped working after a week

utterances.utterance: Please determine if the comment 'The hotel room was clean and the staff were very friendly' is positive or negative.

parameters.text: The hotel room was clean and the staff were very friendly

utterances.utterance: Can you analyze the sentiment of 'The app interface is confusing and difficult to navigate'?

parameters.text: The app interface is confusing and difficult to navigate
